directions: Season chicken, if desired, with salt and pepper or Knorr® Chicken flavor Bouillon. Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and cook chicken, stirring frequently, until chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 5 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Remove and set aside.
Prepare Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Yellow Rice in same skillet according to package directions.
Stir in chicken, avocado and tomato until well blended. Top, if desired, with shredded Cheddar cheese, chopped red onion, and cilantro.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
1 (5.4 ounce) package Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Yellow Rice
title: Fiesta Lime Chicken
